trans-unit.source: Allows an object to control its own serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 允許物件控制它自己的序列化 (Serialization) 和還原序列化 (Deserialization)。

trans-unit.source: Any class that might be serialized must be marked with the <xref:System.SerializableAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 可能會序列化任何類別都必須標記為<xref:System.SerializableAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: If a class needs to control its serialization process, it can implement the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果類別需要控制其序列化程序，它可以實作<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter> calls the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> at serialization time and populates the supplied <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with all the data required to represent the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter>呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>序列化次並於其中填入提供<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>來代表物件的所需的所有資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter> creates a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with the type of the object in the graph.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter>建立<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>與圖形中的物件類型。

trans-unit.source: Objects that need to send proxies for themselves can use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.FullTypeName%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AssemblyName%2A> methods on <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> to change the transmitted information.
trans-unit.target: 需要傳送本身可以使用的 proxy 物件<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.FullTypeName%2A>和<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AssemblyName%2A>方法<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>變更傳輸的資訊。

trans-unit.source: In the case of class inheritance, it is possible to serialize a class that derives from a base class that implements <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>.
trans-unit.target: 在類別繼承的情況下是可序列化的類別，衍生自基底類別實作<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the derived class should call the base class implementation of <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> inside its implementation of <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，衍生的類別應該呼叫基底類別實作<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>其實作內部<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the data from the base class will not be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 否則，將不會序列化的基底類別中的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface implies a constructor with the signature constructor (<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> information, <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> context).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>介面隱含的建構函式簽章的建構函式 (<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>的詳細資訊，<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>內容)。

trans-unit.source: At deserialization time, the current constructor is called only after the data in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> has been deserialized by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 在還原序列化時，目前的建構函式呼叫中的資料後才<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>已經還原序列化格式子。

trans-unit.source: In general, this constructor should be protected if the class is not sealed.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，這個建構函式應該受到保護，如果類別並未密封。

trans-unit.source: The order in which objects are deserialized cannot be guaranteed.
trans-unit.target: 無法保證還原序列化物件的順序。

trans-unit.source: For example, if one type references a type that has not been deserialized yet, an exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果一個類型參考已不尚未還原序列化的型別，就會發生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you are creating types that have such dependencies, you can work around the problem by implementing the `IDeserializationCallback` interface and the `OnDeserialization` method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要建立具有這類相依性的類型，您可以藉由實作暫時解決此問題`IDeserializationCallback`介面和`OnDeserialization`方法。

trans-unit.source: The serialization architecture handles object types that extend <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> the same as types that extend <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 序列化架構會處理擴充的物件類型<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>擴充的型別相同<xref:System.Object>。

trans-unit.source: These types can be marked with the <xref:System.SerializableAttribute> and implement the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface as any other object type.
trans-unit.target: 這些類型都可以使用標記<xref:System.SerializableAttribute>並實作<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>介面做為其他類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: Their object state will be captured and persisted onto the stream.
trans-unit.target: 將擷取其狀態的物件，並將其保存在資料流。

trans-unit.source: When these types are being used through <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting>, the remoting infrastructure provides a surrogate that preempts typical serialization and instead serializes a proxy to the <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>.
trans-unit.target: 當透過使用這些類型<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting>，遠端執行功能基礎結構提供優先執行一般的序列化，並改為將序列化的 proxy 代理<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>。

trans-unit.source: A surrogate is a helper that knows how to serialize and deserialize objects of a particular type.
trans-unit.target: 代理是協助程式知道如何序列化和還原序列化特定類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: The proxy, invisible to the user in most cases, will be of type <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>.
trans-unit.target: 類型 proxy，看不到在大部分情況下，使用者將會是<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>。

trans-unit.source: As a general design pattern, it would be unusual for a class to be both marked with the serializable attribute and extend <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>.
trans-unit.target: 作為一般設計模式中，會是兩者都標記為可序列化的屬性和擴充的類別不尋常<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>。

trans-unit.source: Developers should think carefully about the possible serialization and remoting scenarios when combining these two characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 結合這兩個特性時，開發人員應該請仔細考慮有關可能之序列化和遠端處理案例。

trans-unit.source: One example where this might be applicable is with a <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>.
trans-unit.target: 其中，這可能是適用的其中一個範例是使用<xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>。

trans-unit.source: While the base class of <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> (<xref:System.IO.Stream>) extends from <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>, it is possible to capture the state of a <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> and restore it at will.
trans-unit.target: 雖然的基底類別<xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>(<xref:System.IO.Stream>) 從延伸<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>，便可擷取的狀態<xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>和還原在。

trans-unit.source: It might, therefore, be meaningful to serialize the state of this stream into a database and restore it at some later point in time.
trans-unit.target: 因此，它可能會有意義序列化資料庫上的這個資料流的狀態，並在稍後還原的時間。

trans-unit.source: However, when used through remoting, an object of this type would be proxied.
trans-unit.target: 不過，當使用遠端執行功能，此類型的物件會代理。

trans-unit.source: For more information about serialization of classes that extend <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>, see <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關擴充的類別的序列化<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>，請參閱<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about implementing <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>, see [Custom Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/custom-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關實作<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>，請參閱[自訂序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/custom-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface to define custom serialization behavior for a class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>介面來定義自訂序列化類別的行為。

trans-unit.source: Implement this interface to allow an object to take part in its own serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個介面可允許使用它自己的序列化和還原序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: 要以資料填入的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The destination (see <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />) for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: 這個序列化的目的端 (請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />)。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: 將序列化目標物件所需的資料填入 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Any objects that are included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 包含在任何物件<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>自動追蹤和序列化格式子。

trans-unit.source: Code that calls <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> requires the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> for providing serialization services.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫的程式碼<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>提供序列化服務。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SerializationFormatter?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SerializationFormatter?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: It is not guaranteed that this method will be called only once per object instance during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 不保證，呼叫這個方法會一次只能每個物件執行個體在序列化期間。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the method should be implemented in such a way that its behavior will be the same regardless of the number of times it is called.
trans-unit.target: 因此，此方法應該實作其行為會不論呼叫的次數相同的方式。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> method to set alternate values for a serialized object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>方法，以設定替代的序列化物件的值。

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AddValue%2A> method of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> class to store the alternate values when the object is serialized.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會使用<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AddValue%2A>方法<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>類別來序列化物件時，儲存的替代值。

trans-unit.source: Conversely, when the constructor of the `Person` class is called during deserialization, the alternatve values are retrieved using the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.GetValue%2A> method and reassigned to the object's fields.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，當建構函式`Person`類別稱為還原序列化期間，使用擷取 alternatve 值<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.GetValue%2A>方法並重新指派給物件的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。
